```{python}
skills_query = """
SELECT skill_id, skill
FROM skills
WHERE skill_type_id IS NULL
"""

dim_skills = query(skills_query)
dim_skills
```

```{python}
characters_query = """
SELECT *
FROM characters
ORDER BY character_id DESC
LIMIT 1
"""

dim_characters = query(characters_query)
dim_characters
```
